text:
René Follet (10 April 1931 — 14 March 2020), sometimes known by the pen name Ref, was a Belgian illustrator, comics writer and artist. He worked for the Dutch magazine "Eppo", and for the major publishing houses in Belgium and France, including Dupuis, Le Lombard, and Glénat.
Follet died at the age of 88 on March 14, 2020.
